data.title: Film & Media Studies
data.meta_description: Listed by year of graduation 2024  Geneveive Newman, Online Editor, New Review of Film and Television Studies Dissertation Title: “Of Victims and Survivors: Representing Collective and Individual Rape Trauma” Chair: Adam Lowenstein Readers: Neepa Majumdar, Mark Lynn Anderson, Bridget Keown (Gender, Sexuality, and Women’s Studies), and David Pettersen (French) 2023
